pong

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • pong.FieldObject
      • pong.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends FieldObject
    Represents a ball in the Pong game.
    Author:
    Sergii Zhevzhyk

      • accelerate

        private Ball.AccelerateResult accelerate(double dt)
        Accelerates the speed of the ball in order to have some challenge
        Parameters:
        dt - time interval
        Returns:
        position of the ball for the next step

      • intercept

        private Ball.InterceptionResult intercept(double x1,
                                          double y1,
                                          double x2,
                                          double y2,
                                          double x3,
                                          double y3,
                                          double x4,
                                          double y4,
                                          java.lang.String direction)
        Calculates an interception between two lines. More information: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/563198/how-do-you-detect-where-two-line-segments-intersect/565282#565282
        Parameters:
        x1 - coordinate X of the first point of a first line.
        y1 - coordinate Y of the first point of a first line.
        x2 - coordinate X of the second point of a first line.
        y2 - coordinate Y of the second point of a first line.
        x3 - coordinate X of the first point of a second line.
        y3 - coordinate Y of the first point of a second line.
        x4 - coordinate X of the second point of a second line.
        y4 - coordinate Y of the second point of a second line.
        direction - defines a direction of the ball.
        Returns:
        Returns a point of interception between two lines. Returns null when two lines don't intercept.

      • ballIntercept

        private Ball.InterceptionResult ballIntercept(Paddle paddle,
                                              double nx,
                                              double ny)
        Checks all possible interceptions between the ball and the paddle.
        Parameters:
        paddle - given paddle.
        nx - difference between new and old positions of the ball.
        ny - difference between new and old positions of the ball.
        Returns:
        parameters of possible interception.

      • update

        public void update(double dt,
                   PongState state)
        Calculates a position of the ball for the next step
        Parameters:
        dt - time interval
        state - current state of the simulation

      • reset

        public void reset(int team)
        Resets the position and the direction of a ball. The position is defined based on a number of the ball.
